  {
    "scene_id": "SCN-ARC-002-001",
    "arc_id": "ARC-002",
    "objective": "Elias discovers a hidden compartment containing previous keepers' records",
    "conflict": "Elias must decide whether to read the disturbing records or maintain his ignorance",
    "conflict_type": "internal",
    "emotion_target": "anticipation",
    "emotion_intensity": 0.5,
    "seeds_planted": [],
    "seeds_bloomed": [],
    "subtext": {
      "character_thinks": "These records might explain the disappearances",
      "reader_knows": "The records contain dangerous knowledge",
      "tension_type": "dramatic irony",
      "implied_emotion": "dread"
    },
    "sensory_anchor": "The musty smell of old leather and salt-stained paper",
    "constraints": [],
    "beats": [],
    "target_word_count": 800,
    "justification": "Establishes the discovery that drives the arc's central revelation"
  },
  {
    "scene_id": "SCN-ARC-002-002",
    "arc_id": "ARC-002",
    "objective": "Elias reads the records and learns about what lies beneath the deep waters",
    "conflict": "The knowledge from the records conflicts with Elias's understanding of his duty",
    "conflict_type": "existential",
    "emotion_target": "fear",
    "emotion_intensity": 0.9,
    "seeds_planted": [],
    "seeds_bloomed": [],
    "subtext": {
      "character_thinks": "The light protects against something ancient and hungry",
      "reader_knows": "Elias is now burdened with the same knowledge that drove others mad",
      "tension_type": "situational",
      "implied_emotion": "terror"
    },
    "sensory_anchor": "The scratching sound of desperate handwriting on deteriorating pages",
    "constraints": [],
    "beats": [],
    "target_word_count": 1200,
    "justification": "Delivers the arc's climactic revelation about the true nature of the lighthouse's purpose"
  },
  {
    "scene_id": "SCN-ARC-002-003",
    "arc_id": "ARC-002",
    "objective": "Elias grapples with the weight of forbidden knowledge and his isolation",
    "conflict": "Elias must continue his duty while carrying the burden of terrible truth",
    "conflict_type": "internal",
    "emotion_target": "sadness",
    "emotion_intensity": 0.7,
    "seeds_planted": [],
    "seeds_bloomed": [],
    "subtext": {
      "character_thinks": "He understands why the previous keepers disappeared",
      "reader_knows": "Elias is following the same path as his predecessors",
      "tension_type": "tragic",
      "implied_emotion": "despair"
    },
    "sensory_anchor": "The weight of the lighthouse key cold against his palm",
    "constraints": [],
    "beats": [],
    "target_word_count": 600,
    "justification": "Provides emotional resolution while setting up the psychological stakes for the final arc"
